Map Description: Very intiresnaya map for zombie server, map a large and it has a lot of points with which intiresnyh conveniently extinguish zombakov also map a lot of Secret, some of them can be easy to find but impossible to find some! Map is a desert in which there is a pyramid, and on which you can stroll and sew a couple zombakov or become one of the most zombakov go and infect the rest. On the map there is room sikretnaya is very hidden and to which no real dobratsya if not to show the way to the room you can start a song and also press for a bonus receive a bonus picture. Even on the map there is room troll, troll through the room is called what it trollfeys drawn, that little room on the street but it is not really about identity dobratsya. But the map is the Secret that easy to find! Map a intiresnaya advise to put on the server!

Map and tested on CSSv34 CSSv61
